title: Hotel Inferno 3: The Castle of Screams

jump_scares.spoiler: Frank quickly removes a womanâ€™s hood and underneath is revealed to be a burnt corpse that begins to growl
As Frank slowly reaches for the the hood, the woman suddenly stabs him
A demon smashes through the wall as Frank turns around
Frank peers into a dark alleyway and the camera quickly zooms onto one of the mini demons as it shrieks
Frank looks up at the ceiling and sees a large chicken claw dangling from above the boards accompanied by a sound cue
A demon jumps out from behind a pile of flesh and bones
Frank looks down on the floor and sees there is a demon right underneath him
